title: Logo I have to use
content:
I'm a web-designer who has to use this logo, anyone know what font/fonts the logo and tag-line are set in? Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020080619im_/http:/typophile.com/files/HEI-Logo_Final_3636.jpg)
author: Jeremiah

comments.content:
The logo looks like Trajan, and the tagline could be Poetica, but I'm checking on that.

- Mike Yanega

I think the tagline is Zapf Chancery Swash. (a.k.a. [Zapf Chancery Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020080619/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/itc-zapf-chancery/))

- Mike Yanega
